Character:
Nisaburo, in fact Haruji Komazawa (浮洲の仁三郎実は駒沢春次 / 浮洲の仁三郎実は駒沢春次)

Plays:

The Story of the Morning Glory (Shōutsushi asagao banashi / 生写朝顔話)

Authority Control:
May 1978 Program; Kabuki tōjō jinbutsu jiten (Tokyo: Hakusuisha, 2006)
